channel.title: cancer on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in cancer on Barefoot Rob

item.title: aunt mercedes
item.description: 2 February 1999 My Aunt Mercedes died a few days ago. She had pretty bad and icky cancer all over, so I’m glad that she’s no longer suffering from that. She remains a super great loving wonderful memory in my mind. I appreciate all the care she gave to her kids and us. Today Fred is driving down from Denton to Houston and he and I will drive over to Slidell, Louisiana, a trip we’ve taken several times with lots of fun memories.
